data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I had my knee looked at by a specialist this morning. It ____ been ____ and ____ for ____ now. I ____ starting ____ get ____ that ____ was ____ wrong ____ it. The specialist assured me that nothing is damaged, but that too much exercise could be putting unnecessary strain on it.
data.partBlankContent: I had my knee looked at by a specialist this morning. It h__ been ach___ and so__ for we___ now. I w__ starting t_ get wor____ that some_____ was seri_____ wrong wi__ it. The specialist assured me that nothing is damaged, but that too much exercise could be putting unnecessary strain on it.
data.fullContent: I had my knee looked at by a specialist this morning. It has been aching and sore for weeks now. I was starting to get worried that something was seriously wrong with it. The specialist assured me that nothing is damaged, but that too much exercise could be putting unnecessary strain on it.
data.answer: 今天早上我让一位专家检查了我的膝盖。已经疼了好几个星期了。我开始担心是不是有什么严重的问题。专家向我保证没有任何损伤，但是过多的运动可能会给它带来不必要的压力。
